Posts.Content: Dec 6, 2013 11:46AM LauraWarrior wrote: Hi everyone, Joining the topic late... my wife (Cat) will probably be scheduled for surgery in December but we are not sure as of now... she was Dx on 11/25 and we are waiting for a second opinion on Monday. Just wondering why nobody should schedule surgery on Dec 18th, is this an "inside joke" or is it because you don't want your 1-week follow up to land on Xmas?? Thank you! Laura
